items.title: Canada Post Strike â€“ Japan Post Shipments Suspended
items.author: Joanna Kochanowska
items.content:
Japan Post has informed us that the Canadian Postal Service has been on strike since September 26, 2025.

As a result, Japan Post has suspended all shipments to Canada starting September 30, 2025, until further notice. We have disabled Japan Post shipping options to Canada in the Blackship system.

  • No new shipments to Canada can be sent with Japan Post for the time being.
  • Packages already dispatched to Canada may experience significant delays or, in some cases, be returned.

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience and understanding while this situation continues.
